responses.text: Spamming is not allowed in any channel, including voice channels.
Attacking a person or the community itself is prohibited.
NSFW (not safe for work) contents in text, voice, or image format are prohibited.
Do not ping (tag) users in your messages extensively for no valid reason.
Do not DM (direct message) community members for help. Use the coding-help channels instead.
Promoting or advertising products, services, websites, videos, or any other content that leads to financial gains is prohibited.
Do not be abusive toward other community members. We don't make jokes to other community members' expense, nor should you.
Promoting hate in image, text, or video form is prohibited.
Posting suspicious links that lead to harmful or illegal websites is prohibited, and will be reported to Discord.
Please use English in your communication on this server.
Please avoid discussing sensitive topics like substance abuse, illegal activity, self harm, etc.

When sharing code with the community, please use the correct formatting:
\```py
# YOUR CODE HERE
\```
For longer scripts use [Hastebin](https://hastebin.com/) or [GitHub Gists](https://gist.github.com/) and share the link here

Do not ask whether you can ask. Do not ask whether someone can help.
Instead **ask away**, tell us what your goal is, **provide the *related, relevant* code with proper formatting**, and we will do our best to give you an answer.
